name: Code Quality Check
description: Enforce coding standards, detect code smells, and suggest refactoring

then.prompt:
Analyze code quality:
1. Check coding standards compliance
2. Detect code smells (duplication, complexity, dead code)
3. Identify refactoring opportunities
4. Check function/component size
5. Verify proper error handling
6. Review type safety

Provide actionable refactoring suggestions with examples.
